mapper.select: select e.emp_id, e.emp_name, e.password, e.phone, e.address, e.email, e.position, e.dep_id, d.dep_name as depName from employee_test e left join departments d on e.dep_id = d.dep_id order by e.emp_id
mapper.update: UPDATE employee_test SET emp_name = #{empName}, phone = #{phone}, address = #{address}, email = #{email}, dep_id = #{depId}, position = #{position} WHERE emp_id = #{empId}
